head.description: Get the latest travel news, guides, tips and ideas. See photos and slideshows of the most beautiful places, best vacation spots and places to visit.
head.title: Condé Nast Traveler - Travel Reviews, News, Guides & Tips | Condé Nast Traveler
head.social.title: Condé Nast Traveler - Travel Reviews, News, Guides & Tips
head.social.description: Get the latest travel news, guides, tips and ideas. See photos and slideshows of the most beautiful places, best vacation spots and places to visit.
head.promo.dek: Get the latest travel news, guides, tips and ideas. See photos and slideshows of the most beautiful places, best vacation spots and places to visit.

items.dangerousBio: Megan Spurrell is an associate editor at Condé Nast Traveler. Originally from Los Angeles, she's made homes of Rio de Janeiro, Lima, and Oakland prior to landing in Brooklyn where she is currently based. This year, she hopes to make her first visit to Africa (the music scene in Dakar...

items.dangerousBio: Caitlin Morton has been working at Condé Nast Traveler since July 2014. She enjoys baked goods, Ireland, orange nail polish, and words. One time she held the door open for Ian McKellen, which is as close to fame as she will ever get.

items.dangerousBio: Kelsy Chauvin is a writer and photographer based in Brooklyn. She specializes in travel, culture and LGBT interests, and has a special fondness for eating and drinking well, thanks in large part to her Cajun heritage.

items.dangerousBio: Meredith Carey is the Travel Bookings Editor at Condé Nast Traveler. She also co-hosts the weekly Women Who Travel podcast, which she and fellow Traveler editor Lale Arikoglu launched in 2017. She's hosted live podcast episodes at SXSW and Feast Portland and has appeared on WeWork Now panels, WNYC, and...
items.name: Meredith Carey

items.dangerousBio: Madison Flager is the Commerce Editor at Condé Nast Traveler. A Florida native and UNC Chapel Hill grad, Madison has written for Delish, Venice Magazine, Greatist, and Fitt. Her work has also been featured on Cosmopolitan, Esquire, Good Housekeeping, and Runner's World.
items.name: Madison Flager
